DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of Avastin (15mg/kg iv) in combination with Docetaxel and Xeloda, given as pre-operative therapy to patients with primary breast cancer. Avastin will be administered every 3 weeks, for the first 5 cycles of chemotherapy. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With Chemotherapy in Patients With Primary Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: female patients, 1870years of age; histologicallyproven invasive breast cancer; no prior or current neoplasm except for nonmelanoma skin cancer, or in situ cancer of the cervix; no distant disease/secondary cancer. pregnant or lactating women; preoperative local treatment for breast cancer; prior or concurrent systemic antitumor therapy; clinically significant cardiac disease.
